briefdescription.para: Convenience function to create icon from a pixmap and for pixmapSizes.
Convenience function to overlay icon pixmap(s) with an overlay pixmap.
Draws iconB on top of iconA.
Convenience function to create a plugin icon, which consists of maximum of four characters laid out in a grid.
Combines two (or more) icons into a horizontal icon.

parameterdescription.para: Vector of input icons (need to be the same height)

briefdescription.para: Creates a pixmap with a number badge from number, badgeBackgroundColor and foregroundColor.

parameterdescription.para: Integral to display in the badge

briefdescription.para: Creates a pixmap with a number badge from widgetActionBadge.
Overlays icon with a number badge in color and with alignment.

memberdef.argsstring: ({ { "None", static_cast< DockAreaFlag >(DockAreaFlag::None) }, { "Left", static_cast< DockAreaFlag >(DockAreaFlag::Left) }, { "Right", static_cast< DockAreaFlag >(DockAreaFlag::Right) }, { "Above", static_cast< DockAreaFlag >(DockAreaFlag::Top) }, { "Beneath", static_cast< DockAreaFlag >(DockAreaFlag::Bottom) }, { "Tabbed", static_cast< DockAreaFlag >(DockAreaFlag::Center) } })
memberdef.name: dockAreaMap

param.type: { { "None", static_cast< DockAreaFlag >(DockAreaFlag::None) }, { "Left", static_cast< DockAreaFlag >(DockAreaFlag::Left) }, { "Right", static_cast< DockAreaFlag >(DockAreaFlag::Right) }, { "Above", static_cast< DockAreaFlag >(DockAreaFlag::Top) }, { "Beneath", static_cast< DockAreaFlag >(DockAreaFlag::Bottom) }, { "Tabbed", static_cast< DockAreaFlag >(DockAreaFlag::Center) } }

briefdescription.para: Maps dock area string to dock area flag.
